description: The resource schema for AWSLogs QueryDefinition

LogGroup.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 512  
Pattern: [\.\-_/#A-Za-z0-9]+  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: A name for the saved query definition
Name.markdownDescription:
A name for the saved query definition

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^([^:*\/]+\/?)*[^:*\/]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

QueryString.description: The query string to use for this definition
QueryString.markdownDescription:
The query string to use for this definition

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 10000  
Update requires: No interruption

LogGroupNames.description: Optionally define specific log groups as part of your query definition

items.markdownDescription:
LogGroup name

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

LogGroupNames.markdownDescription:
Optionally define specific log groups as part of your query definition

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

QueryDefinitionId.markdownDescription:

---
